name: Beauty and the Baker
overview: Amos, a 28-year-old baker, still lives with his parents and works in the family business. Noa is the most famous woman in the country and the beautiful daughter of a hotel magnate. Noa and Amos will meet by mistake, but it's a meeting neither will ever forget...

episodes.name: Artichoke Soup
episodes.overview: Amos and Vanessa are celebrating their nine-year anniversary at the town's most fashionable restaurant. Amos knows Vanessa is expecting a proposal, but he's still unsure of his feelings... The presence of the famous Noa Hollander at the same restaurant is also a slight distraction. When Vanessa decides to take matters into her own hands, everyone's evening takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Superman
episodes.overview: Vanessa issues an ultimatum - propose to her by 8pm or Amos loses her for good. Unfortunately, Amos's family, never Vanessa's biggest fans, have mixed opinions on the matter. Noa's agent Tzvika, determined to disrupt any budding romance, sets the young baker up for humiliation - leaving Amos and his relationship status up in the air in more ways than one.

episodes.name: Noa's Fan, Part 1
episodes.overview: Despite his fear of flying Amos finds himself on a plane to London, accompanying Noa to a gallery opening. During the flight, Noa studies for her upcoming audition for a Hollywood blockbuster. The film's producer, a notorious womaniser, insists on taking Noa to dinner after the opening, leaving Amos alone and abandoned in a strange town. Back at home, his brother Assaf is in for a surprise.

episodes.name: Noa's Fan, Part 2
episodes.overview: It's midnight and Amos, phone-less and wallet-less on the streets of London, is about to discover that there are no free rides, when his rescuer turns out to be Noa's most determined fan. Noa has also attracted the attentions of a stalker, who decides to use her film career as a bargaining chip. Amos races to the rescue, but as our unlikely couple grow closer, has he been entirely truthful?

episodes.name: Friday Night Dinner
episodes.overview: Friday, 7pm: Noa is due to arrive for dinner at the family's small apartment and Amos's mother Amalia is hysterical. Despite a rapidly growing festival of lies, the family manage to dance around the pitfalls during dinner... until Vanessa storms in in her pyjamas. With all the cards on the table and a handsome millionaire besieging Noa with flowers, is Amos about to wake up from this dream?

episodes.name: Over? Not Over!
episodes.overview: A week after the disastrous family dinner, Noa and Amos still haven't spoken. Against his better instincts, Assaf, who's dreaming of being a singer, is persuaded to sell a photo of his brother with Noa to the press. A decision he immediately regrets when Amos realizes Vanessa's dreams with a marriage proposal. It's the happiest night of Vanessa's life, but elsewhere, Noa is finally ready to talk...

episodes.name: Meet Amos
episodes.overview: Amos hasn't slept all night, he's just stared at Noa, the most amazing woman he could ever have dreamt of. He just has to solve one minor issue... telling his fiancée Vanessa about her. Unfortunately, this task may have already been ticked by the press, who are eager to reveal everything about Noa's new guy. Meanwhile, it's time for Amos's father Avi to respect his children's choices.

episodes.name: Tzvika Almighty
episodes.overview: When Amos surprises Noa with a huge painting, Noa is impressed with his talent. Assaf arranges a gig for himself - despite the year's biggest basketball game taking place on the same night... If he can get his guests of honour there, he can fill the place. Vanessa and Tzvika discover that they have a shared interest - but is Noa and Amos's relationship strong enough to survive their scheming?

episodes.name: Eilat Here We Come
episodes.overview: Amos and Noa's happiness is destroyed with the news that her ex Pete, a major Hollywood star, is due to arrive in town - the papers are already comparing Noa's leading men, somewhat unfavourably for Amos. Vanessa and Tzvika put their plan into action. Amos's little sister Meirav tests her feelings, while Assaf's life is playing out like a movie - unfortunately one with a pretty tragic storyline...

episodes.name: Four Kisses
episodes.overview: Pete doesn't waste a second, proposing to Noa the moment he steps off the plane! Vanessa rushes to inform Amos, adding her own lies to the story. With her eldest son heartbroken, Assaf's dreams of stardom ruined and Meirav's love life in turmoil, Amalia decides to fix things. But when Vanessa finally comes clean, is Amos prepared to fight for Noa's love?

episodes.name: Dad is coming
episodes.overview: Six months on and Amos, although still working at the bakery, has swapped his family's cramped apartment for Noa's luxurious house. During a lavish surprise party, thrown by Noa for Amos's birthday, Noa has yet another revelation in store, but their celebrations are cut short by the unexpected, and distinctly unwelcome, arrival of Noa's father, hotel tycoon Gideon Hollander.

episodes.name: The Worst Day of her Life
episodes.overview: Amos and Noa's difference of opinion about the plan for their upcoming wedding becomes very public knowledge, forcing Noa to apologise. Meanwhile, Gideon's assistant Eden has a message for Amos and, with more dirt about to be dished by ex-girlfriend Vanessa, becomes an unlikely ally in negotiating her silence. But will it be enough to repair Noa's long-fractured relationship with her father?

episodes.name: Yair from the Past
episodes.overview: Noa learns that her father is on the verge of bankruptcy and the one person who can save him is her rich handsome childhood friend, Yair Altman. Gideon needs Noa's help to win Yair's forgiveness. Despite Yair's surprising revelations, Noa succeeds in smoothing things over, but later Yair delivers an unexpected ultimatum. Assaf takes a radical step to win his mother's approval of girlfriend Blanca.

episodes.name: In a Wedding Dress
episodes.overview: Gideon is closer than ever to bankruptcy. Nonetheless, he has no intention of agreeing to Yair's unimaginable demand to spend one night with his daughter. Having finally succeeded in becoming someone's fiancée, Vanessa finds - and loses - her dream wedding gown. Amos faces a difficult decision, while Noa continues what she thinks is a harmless flirtation - with Yair.

episodes.name: Gangster
episodes.overview: It's the morning of the premiere of Gangster, Noa's new Hollywood film, and Amos surprises her with a present to wear that evening - his grandmother's gold necklace. Unfortunately for Amos, his rival Yair also has a surprise gift and this one comes with diamonds... As tensions mount and plots unfold, the evening will end with some relationships in crisis and some just beginning.

episodes.name: In Bulgaria
episodes.overview: It's the morning after the premiere and, with the movie receiving rave reviews, Noa sets off to Amsterdam for the next showing. But with Amos on his way to Bulgaria with Eden and Gideon, supposedly to sell Amos's paintings, her happiness is incomplete. Yair surprises Noa in Amsterdam - but it will be Amos's love that is put to the test tonight. Assaf, Blanca and Amalia attempt a reconciliation.

episodes.name: There Was Nothing Because There's Nothing
episodes.overview: Amos wants to come clean about events in Bulgaria, but Noa beats him to the punch, excitedly telling him that she has been accepted for a new movie role. And when Noa asks Amos to join her in New Zealand for the three month shoot, she's surprised when he agrees. Unfortunately, Eden's attempts to solve Gideon's financial crisis will ensure Amos's secret doesn't stay hidden for long.

episodes.name: Red Wedding
episodes.overview: After a tough night, Noa tells the media the reason for their separation: Amos had cheated on her. Yair doesn't miss this opportunity to be by Noa's side for all to see. Vanessa's wedding descends into chaos when the truth about what happened on the night of the premiere comes out. Tzvika has important information about Eden, but Noa refuses to listen as she heads to Yair's house.

episodes.name: Bad News
episodes.overview: As Amos packs up his possessions, Tzvika reveals her discovery about Eden's real identity. Amos confronts Gideon, convinced that he is behind the whole conspiracy, but the truth will have devastating consequences. Is Amos too late to stop Yair getting what he wants? Vanessa's family attempt an intervention - it's time she freed herself from her obsession with Amos.

episodes.name: Garden of Eden
episodes.overview: Eden and Yair's plan for revenge comes together, and Noa realizes that, just like her father, she is now penniless. But, much to Eden's dismay, Yair has a pang of conscience. Amos makes a bargain to help Assaf, before meeting Noa with an unexpected surprise. But, with Eden determined not to let Noa have the upper hand, can Amos and Noah ever reach their happy ending?

episodes.name: Save the date
episodes.overview: It's been three years since the wedding of Noa and Amos.
